post_title: FS - Raw Tinker & M. Brown Portraits
post_content:
Getting rid of a couple of nice, but lower grade cards. Prices are NET to me and will include tracked shipping. I’m not real proficient with posting pictures on here, so if you’re interested in either send me a PM and I’ll email or text you some pics. 

Mordecai Brown (port.) Piedmont 350……$275

Joe Tinker (port.) SC 150/30…..$300

The Tinker is nice…..it was formerly in a SGC 1 holder but is now raw. I can include the flip. It has a nipped corner, hence the previous grade. It was also part of the Joe Garagiola collection and is labeled accordingly.
